content.prompt: Which of the following arguments at the time most directly challenged the viewpoint in the image?

choices.label: Dependence on foreign oil would require a shift to renewable sources of energy.
Tax cuts and reducing the influence of government would benefit the public.
Public sector unionization would lead to greater empowerment of workers.
Free trade agreements would foster integration of global markets.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
